songs.title: Silent Night
songs.album: A Why Don’t We Christmas - EP
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1 of the Original Silent Night]

[Jack Avery]
Silent night

[Jack Avery; Zach Herron harmonizing]
Holy night

[Jonah Marais]
(Holy night)

[Jack Avery; Zach Herron & Corbyn Besson harmonizing]
And all is calm
And all is bright

[Jonah Marais]
(All is bright)

[Jack Avery; Corbyn Besson harmonizing; Zach Herron background vocals]
Round yon Virgin Mother and Child

[Jack Avery; Zach Herron harmonizing; Corbyn Besson ad-libs]
Holy Infant so tender and mild

[Jack Avery & Daniel Seavey; Corbyn Besson & Zach Herron background vocals]
Sleep in heaven, heavenly peace, heavenly peace

[Jonah Marais]
(Heavenly peace)

[Jack Avery & Daniel Seavey; Corbyn Besson & Zach Herron background vocals]
Sleep in heaven, heavenly peace, heavenly peace

[Jonah Marais]
(Heavenly, pea-ea-ea-eace)
